text:
@realDonaldTrump @RoyCooperNC @DanForestNC God what a whiny twit this guy is. Glad that the @GOPconvention will not be bringing all that ignorance and spreading all that #COVID19 in NC. 

Or, how do you say, @RoyCooperNC is winning bigly.
